product_title: Blue Star Y Series 5 in 1 Convertible 1.5 Ton 3 Star Inverter Split AC with Self Diagnosis (Copper Condenser, ID318YKU)
overview_text:
Efficient Cooling



The Blue Star ID318YKU 1.5-ton Split Air Conditioner has an airflow volume of up to 471CFM, ensuring efficient cooling for rooms as large as 180Sq.Ft. Furthermore, this split air Conditioner incorporates advanced turbo cooling to cool down your room rapidly, offering swift relief from the heat as soon as it's powered on. So, your hectic schedule may wear you out, but this AC's immediate cooling ensures that you can quickly recharge and rejuvenate.






5-in-1 Convertible Mode



With its 5-in-1 convertible mode, this AC allows you to flexibly adjust the cooling capacity to suit your needs, providing energy-efficient and customisable cooling solutions. Thus, whether you prefer a subtle breeze or rapid cooling, this AC's 5-in-1 convertible mode enables you to control the cooling capacity.

 
 Sleep Mode



This air conditioner offers a sleep mode that automatically adjusts cooling settings to ensure a peaceful and energy-efficient night's sleep.






Inverter Rotary Compressor



The inverter rotary compressor in this 1.5-ton AC is a testament to its lasting performance and cooling efficiency.






3-Star AC



Choose this air conditioner for a cost-effective cooling solution, as it boasts a 3-star rating and a power consumption of 1730W.






Copper Condenser Coil



This Blue Star air conditioner, equipped with a copper condenser coil, ensures optimal heat exchange efficiency, leading to effective and quick cooling within your space.






Anti-Dust Filter



Equipped with an effective anti-dust filter that is designed to capture dust, allergens, and airborne impurities, this AC makes sure that your indoor air remains fresh and free of contaminants.






R32 Refrigerant



This air conditioner, with its R32 refrigerant, ensures eco-friendly and effective cooling performance.






Stabiliser-Free Operation



This air conditioner's stabiliser-free operation ensures it can handle voltage fluctuations without the need for an additional stabiliser.






Inverter Compatibility



When you have this inverter-compatible AC, power cuts won't disrupt your cooling comfort. Hence, if you value continuous comfort in your home, this inverter-compatible AC is a smart investment.

1 Year Comprehensive Warranty, 10 Years Compressor Warranty
